card - package card
 
Card - Class in card
This is the abstract parent class from which the various child classes are extended.

ChatClient - Class in client
This class creates the socket for the client.

constructor of ChatClient to initialize the attributes hostname and port.
ChatServer - Class in server
This class mainly deals with establishing connection between server and client and helps in communication between different users.
ChatServer(int) - Constructor for class server.ChatServer
Constructor for the ChatServer class which initialises the port number.
client - package client
 
communicate(String, Player) - Method in class game.GameController
Method to send in game messages to the users/players.
communicate(String, User) - Method in class server.ChatServer
This method sends a message to each client which is connected to the server except the sender itself.

Method to send in game messages to the users/players.
communicateAll(String) - Method in class server.ChatServer
It sends messages to all the user.
communicateDirect(String, User) - Method in class server.ChatServer
Method to check if input for sending a direct message is valid.
communicateGame(String, User) - Method in class server.ChatServer
Method sends user input including the game commands to the gameController.
